TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class TemplateControl : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService, System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
.class public auto ansi abstract TemplateControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public MustInherit Class TemplateControl Inherits Control Implements IFilterResolutionService, INamingContainer
public ref class TemplateControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IFilterResolutionService, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer

summary.span: 提供一組基礎功能給 類別和 類別。

span.span: Provides the class and the class with a base set of functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別，提供通用的屬性和方法類別和類別。The class is an abstract class that provides common properties and methods for the class and the class. 新執行個體不會直接建立。A new instance of the is not created directly. 類別會定義支援宣告式資料繫結運算式的方法：The class defines methods supporting declarative data-binding expressions: - 使用方法牽涉到資料來源，例如簡單的屬性或運算式的資料繫結運算式。Use the method for data-binding expression involving data sources, such as simple properties or expressions. - 使用進行剖析和評估 XPath 運算式的資料繫結的方法。Use the method for parsing and evaluating an XPath data-binding expression. - 使用方法用於資料繫結包含 XPath 運算式對 select 陳述式。Use the method for data-binding against an expression containing an XPath select statement. 結果是節點集合中實作介面。The result is a node collection that implements the interface. 如需資料繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)和[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on data-binding expression, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca) and [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生控制項，名為`MyControl`從類別並覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a control named `MyControl` from the class and override the method. 當`MyControl`初始化時，覆寫方法呼叫。When `MyControl` is initialized, the overridden method is called. [!code-csharp[TemplateControl_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_Sample1/CS/tempcontrol_samples1.ascx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TemplateControl_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_Sample1/VB/tempcontrol_samples1.ascx.vb#1)]

.event class System.EventHandler AbortTransaction
Public Custom Event AbortTransaction As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ AbortTransaction;

summary.span: 在使用者結束交易時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a user ends a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何註冊的自訂事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to register a custom event handler for the event. 因為是抽象類別，這個程式碼範例會使用類別，衍生自類別。Because is an abstract class, this code example uses the class, which is derived from the class. `Account` 是支援的類別，`Debit`作業，這是交易式，且必須當做一個單位執行。`Account` is a class that supports a `Debit` operation, which is transactional and must execute as a unit. 如果在此作業期間，會引發任何例外狀況，就結束交易。If any exception is raised during this operation, the transaction is ended. [!code-csharp[TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction/CS/templatecontrol_oncommittransaction.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction/VB/templatecontrol_oncommittransaction.vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要在其中剖析和編譯控制項之檔案的應用程式相對虛擬目錄路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the application-relative, virtual directory path to the file from which the control is parsed and compiled.
A string representing the path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當的檔案，定義控制項所在的目錄中以外的頁面處理要求，請使用屬性傳回的應用程式相對的虛擬路徑。When the file that defines a control resides in a directory other than that of the page processing the request, use the property to return the application-relative, virtual path to the . 屬性會根據設定中設定的虛擬路徑屬性。The property is set based on the virtual path that is set in the property.

span.span: The path that is set is .

exception.span: 設定的路徑不是根目錄。

span.span: The path that is set is not rooted.

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，指出主題是否套用至衍生自 類別的控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether themes apply to the control that is derived from the class.
to use themes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否啟用佈景主題，以供衍生自控制項類別。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control that is derived from the class. 當屬性是`true`，要套用的控制項面板中搜尋應用程式的佈景主題目錄。When the property is `true`, the theme directory for the application is searched for control skins to apply. 如果特定的控制項面板佈景主題目錄中，不會套用面板。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式層級的資源會儲存在 App_GlobalResources 資料夾。Application-level resources are stored in the App_GlobalResources folder. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 應用程式中的資源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265)。For more information, see [Resources in ASP.NET Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來存取名為字串`GlobalResourceString1`從名為的全域資源`MyResource.resx`App_GlobalResources 資料夾中。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to access a string named `GlobalResourceString1` from a global resource named `MyResource.resx` in the App_GlobalResources folder. `className`參數是`MyResource`不含.resx 副檔名。The `className` parameter is `MyResource` without the .resx extension. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_GetResources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_GetResources/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_GetResources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_GetResources/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 載入 。

span.span: Loads a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您載入容器控制項的控制項時，此容器會引發所有加入的控制項事件，直到它已在目前的事件。When you load a control into a container control, the container raises all of the added control's events until it has caught up to the current event. 不過，加入的控制項無法趕上回傳資料處理。However, the added control does not catch up with postback data processing. 必須在加入控制項的回傳資料處理，包括驗證，在要參與加入的控制項事件而非在事件。For an added control to participate in postback data processing, including validation, the control must be added in the event rather than in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此控制項支援快取，從傳回的物件方法不是實際物件; 而是物件。If the control supports caching, the object returned from the method is not actually a object; rather, it is a object. 如果`virtualPath`參數是相對，載入控制項的路徑是相對於路徑。If the `virtualPath` parameter is relative, the path of the loaded control is relative to the path of the . 當您載入容器控制項的控制項時，此容器會引發所有加入的控制項事件，直到它已在目前的事件。When you load a control into a container control, the container raises all of the added control's events until it has caught up to the current event. 不過，加入的控制項無法趕上回傳資料處理。However, the added control does not catch up with postback data processing. 必須在加入控制項的回傳資料處理，包括驗證，在要參與加入的控制項事件而非在事件。For an added control to participate in postback data processing, including validation, the control must be added in the event rather than in the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以將使用者控制項加入 ASP.NET 網頁。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to add a user control to an ASP.NET page. 在`OnInit`事件方法，此頁面會使用以程式設計方式建立使用者控制項在頁面上的方法。In the `OnInit` event method, this page uses the method to programmatically create a user control on the page. 方法會將控制項加入屬性Web 伺服器控制項，名為`Placeholder1`。The method adds the control to the property of a Web server control named `Placeholder1`. 定義的`MyControl`類別，用於此程式碼範例，請參閱。For the definition of the `MyControl` class that is used in this code example, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法屬於介面，這是特定的控制項設計工具的環境中所使用的裝置篩選條件。The method is part of the interface, which is specific to how a control uses device filters in a designer environment. 剖析或在瀏覽器要求，內容以外的設計工具的環境中保存控制項提供一個方式來判斷目前的控制會受到以具名的篩選條件和指定的篩選器是否屬於特定的一部分裝置篩選條件的階層。When controls are parsed or persisted in the designer environment outside the context of a browser request, the provides a way to determine if the current control is affected by a named filter and whether a named filter is part of a specific device-filter hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法使用方法來解決運算式評估的物件參考。The method calls the method using the method to resolve the object reference that the expression is evaluated against. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_XPath1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_XPath1/cs/templatecontrolxpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_XPath1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.TemplateControl_XPath1/vb/templatecontrolxpathvb.aspx#1)] 在上述程式碼範例中，可以使用下列測試 XML 資料。The following test XML data can be used in the preceding code example. ``` contact name 1 contact note 1 contact name 2 contact note 2 ```

exception.span: 資料繫結方法只能用於 包含的控制項。

span.span: The data-binding method can be used only for controls contained on a .
